data.meta_site_name: Tribute for Alexandra Sofia Stephan | Conrad & Thompson Funeral Home and Cremation Services
data.text:
Alexandra "Lexi" Sofia Stephan, 28 of Celebration, Florida passed away on Monday, August 7, 2023. Lexi was born in Hamburg, Germany and moved to Celebration in 1999 from Hamburg. She was a Student and worked part time at a local restaurant. Lexi was a Catholic by faith. She grew up playing all sports and excelled at all, she played volleyball at Walt Disney World. She loved her family especially her niece and nephew.

Lexi is survived by her parents: Richard and Gabriela Stephan of Celebration, Florida; her sisters: Toni Kanfer and her husband Michael of Port St. Lucie, Florida and Franny Stephan of Orlando, Florida. Her niece and nephew: Olivia Kanfer and Carter Kanfer.

Where there is a will, there is a way.

A memorial service will be held on Saturday, August 19th at 3 pm at the Celebration Presbyterian Church located at 511 Celebration Avenue, Celebration, Florida 34747

Please join us in wearing something red in honor of her favorite color.

The Stephan family is being cared for by: CONRAD & THOMPSON FUNERAL HOME AND CREMATION SERVICES, 511 Emmett Street, Kissimmee, Florida 34741; 407-847-3188.
